message:
Dear {{ role }},

A compensatory leave request has been submitted and requires your attention. Please find the details below:

- Employee Name: {{ doc.employee_name }}
- Employee ID: {{ doc.employee }}
- Leave Type: {{ doc.leave_type }}
- Compensatory Work Period: {{ doc.work_from_date }} to {{ doc.work_end_date }}
- Reason: {{ doc.reason or 'Not provided' }}
- Request Link: View Request

We request you to kindly review the application and take appropriate action at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,
HR System
name: Compensatory Leave Request Notification
subject: Compensatory Leave Request of {{doc.employee_name}}
